textTemplates.name: Balmaxcombinedamountminus
textTemplates.text:
Dear 

@[{![Account].OwnerId}]

@[{![Account].clofor_com_cfs__Main_owner__c}]

@[{![Account].clofor_com_cfs__SubOwner__c}]

@[{![Account].LastModifiedById}]

 

This Account is having UNCOLLECTED COMBINED AMOUNT under the MAXIMUM ALLOWABLE LEVEL:

1/ Receivable Amount

- Uncollected Receivable(Local) = {![Account].clofor_com_cfs__Unpaid__c}

- Uncollected Receivable(FCY) = {![Account].clofor_com_cfs__UncollectedReceivableFCY__c}

2/ On-Behalf-Of Amount

- Uncollected On-Behalf-Of(Local) = {![Account].clofor_com_cfs__UncollectedOnBehalfOfLocal__c}

- Uncollected On-Behalf-Of(FCY) = {![Account].clofor_com_cfs__UncollectedOnBehalfOfFCY__c}


Please check and have appropriate actions to avoid Uncollected Combined Amount exceeds the company's policy.


----------------------------------------------------------------

This message is sent automatically.

textTemplates.name: FMSbaddebtgreater0
textTemplates.text:
[HIGH PRIORITY]

Dear 

@[{![Account].OwnerId}]

@[{![Account].clofor_com_cfs__Main_owner__c}]

@[{![Account].clofor_com_cfs__SubOwner__c}]

@[{![Account].LastModifiedById}]

 

This Account is having F/TMS BAD DEPT

- FMS Bad Debt(Local) = {![Account].clofor_com_cfs__FMSBadDebtLocal__c}

- FMS Bad Debt(FCY) = {![Account].clofor_com_cfs__FMSBadDebtUSD__c}


Please check and have appropriate actions to collect the bad debts as soon as possible.


----------------------------------------------------------------

This message is sent automatically.
